Name: Nailed It
About the game: Nailed It is a VR puzzle game. You will make a path to your agent to reach its target. Of course there will be some obstacles, threats and traps. All you need is a Nail Gun and some planks. Use your creativity to build path that will lead your agent to victory. Be ready to test your stamina and patience.
